queries.query: monster with high strength that reacts defensive when attacked
queries.variant: creature with strong attack power that has a defensive shift when hit

queries.variant: chaotic neutral hulking dog that resists bludgeoning damage

queries.variant: creature that is fey and has the ability to calm itself with emotions

queries.variant: creature that can transform and possesses a very good constitution score
